item.title: barats
item.description: × BARATS HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ BARATS MOBILE LEGENDS Role: Tank Lane: EXP Lane Tier : A Tier BP : 32000 DM : 599 Ticket : barats × @ Close More Info Hero skills Barats Skills 1 × Big Guy Each time Barats and Detona deal damage to a target with their skills, Detona gains 1 stack of (Big Guy) for 12s, capped at 25 stacks. For each stack of (Big Guy), Detona gains increased body size, 2-5 Physical & Magic Defense, and 2% Resilience.
